meanings.definition: A person who regularly writes and updates a blog.
meanings.sent1: The blogger shared daily stories on their blog.
meanings.sent2: I follow a blogger who posts about travel adventures.
meanings.sent3: The blogger's cat made a surprise appearance in their latest post.
meanings.sent4: She was a blogger, painting pictures with words on her blog.
meanings.sent5: The blogger's words danced off the screen, captivating readers.

meanings.definition: To write entries in, add material to, or maintain a blog.
meanings.sent1: She would blogger her thoughts every evening.
meanings.sent2: I blogger about my weekend trip to the beach.
meanings.sent3: He decided to blogger about his failed cooking experiment.
meanings.sent4: The words bloggered onto the page effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: They would blogger tirelessly, sharing their passion with the world.
